Texto: 
consistent with medial meniscal tear and acl tear.
patient will be undergoing surgical repair.
double pcl sign consistent with bucket handle tear of medial meniscus.
displaced bucket handle tear of the medial meniscus
bucket handle tear, medial meniscus
26 year old male experiencing knee pain after twisting injury.
